roleset.name: omnipresent
roleset.note: UBIQUITOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from ubiquitous.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: = By that time , homes of 100 thousand yuan per square meters will be ubiquitous and will not be affordable for most . Yet affluent people in society can afford it , while others will have no choice but to rent .
example.arg: homes of 100 thousand yuan per square meters

example.name: both args
example.text: One of the experiences [0]-1 I feel [*-1)-2 is ubiquitous to being a nerd is playing a spot of Dungeons and Dragons.
